articles.title: Samsung's Fab Woes Are Now Expected to Cause an SSD Shortage - ExtremeTech
articles.description: New reports suggest Samsung may not ship new SSD controllers from its Austin facility until May. That's a problem considering 75 percent of its SSD controllers come from that factory.
